system.description: Your reflexes and dedication allow you to throw yourself in harm's way to protect your allies, taking hits meant for others through sheer determination and speed.
system.benefit: As a Reaction, character can spend a Fate Point and expend all their actions for their next Round to switch places with an ally within 2 metres so long as no physical obstruction would prevent it. The character becomes target of any attacks previously targeting the ally.

specialAbilities.name: Protective Swap
specialAbilities.description: As a Reaction, spend a Fate Point and your next turn's actions to swap places with an ally within 2m. You become the target of attacks aimed at them.
